name: Person of Interest Highlights
profile:
This channel is a channel dedicated to highlighting the best clips from the t.v. show Person of Interest. All clips shown on this channel belong to Warner Bros and CBS.
For more information on Person of Interest you can go to one of the following websites.
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Person of Interest subreddit  https://www.reddit.com/r/PersonOfInterest/

Person of Interest wiki            http://personofinterest.wikia.com/wiki/Person_of_Interest_Wiki 

Person of interst (CBS)           http://www.cbs.com/shows/person_of_interest/

WarnerBros                               https://www.warnerbros.com/
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Feel free to leave a comment on a video to request a specific scene. (:
